A4.text: In 2024, based on civil registration data from Ministry of Home Affairs, 87.09% of Indonesians are Muslims

A5.text: In 2024, based on civil registration data from Ministry of Home Affairs, 1.67% of Indonesians are Hindu

A6.text: Over 2.5 million Indonesians practiced their version of Hinduism

A7.text: The government officially recognizes six formal religions
